name: abids_json_info
author: AFNI Team
description: A tool to extract information from BIDS formatted json files.

inputs.description: Print the TR from the json file in seconds, from the 'RepetitionTime' field.
inputs.name: TR flag

inputs.description: Print out the 'EchoTime' field in milliseconds (the json file stores it in seconds).
inputs.name: TE flag

inputs.description: Check if there is a .nii or .nii.gz file that matches the .json file (1 if the dataset is loadable).
inputs.name: Match NII flag

inputs.description: Print any field or list of fields from the json file.
inputs.name: Field list

inputs.description: Print a list of the available fields from the .json file. This must be the only argument specified.
inputs.name: List fields flag

inputs.description: Show this help message and exit.
inputs.name: Help flag
